"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game set in a snowy forest environment. A character wearing a cloak and holding a staff is walking through the snow towards an enemy positioned on a rock ledge. The enemy has a health bar above their head, indicating they are a target. The game's interface is visible, showing various icons and gauges in the bottom corners, including a health bar and other status indicators. The screen also displays "Will x67" in the upper right corner, suggesting a resource or currency available to the player.
